name: Waste Free Oceans
goal: Waste Free Oceans, a registered public charity with non- profit status, is a ground breaking public-private foundation that mobilizes the fisheries sector, public authorities and the international plastics industry. Our aim is to contribute to clean oceans by reducing and reusing floating litter. Starting as a pilot project in Europe to encourage fishermen and the plastics industry to collaborate, we now engage in marine litter clean-ups around the world. Together with companies we then turn collected waste into innovative, sustainable products.
interests: Climate Action, Environment, Fisheries and Aquaculture
euInitiatives:
Circular economy, Waste legislation, Water legislation
Landill legislation, EMFF, MSFD
Port Reception Facilities, EU regional seas conventions
